sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
  // FONT-WEIGHTS
  regular: 400, // default
  semiBold: 600,
  bold: 700,

  // FONT-SIZES
  mini: '13px',
  base: '16px', // default font size
  medium: '16px',
  large: '20px',
  xLarge: '22px',


  // LINE-HEIGHTS
  lineHeight1_09: 1.09,
  lineHeight1_2: 1.2,
  lineHeight1_5: 1.5, // default

  // COLORS
  baseColor: '#282828', // default
  white: '#FFFFFF',
  black: '#000000',

  // Z-INDEX
  zIndex1: 1,
  zIndex2: 2,
  zIndex3: 3,
  zIndex4: 4,
  zIndex5: 5,
  zIndex6: 6,
  zIndex7: 7,
  zIndex8: 8,
  zIndex9: 9,
  zIndex10: 10
};
